musicalLanguage.description: A strikingly modern piece from 1888 — spare, floating, and meditative. The simple waltz-like accompaniment and wandering melody anticipated ambient music by nearly a century.
musicalLanguage.structure: A-A'-B: two statements of the theme with a contrasting section
keyMoments: Bar 1: the iconic 7th chords set the dreamy mood
Bar 5: melody enters — floating, unresolved, unhurried
Bars 7-8: the phrase resolves before repeating
B section: subtle shift in harmony deepens the mood
teachingGoals: Expressive simplicity — making few notes count
styleTips: Extremely slow and unhurried — this is meditation music
The 7th chords should be soft and blended
Never accent anything — let gravity do the work
